data.name: treedata.table
data.description: A wrapper for data.table that enables fast manipulation of  phylogenetic trees matched to data.

evidence: "An R package for manipulating phylogenetic data with _data.table_" and "`treedata.table` is a library for syncing data between a dataset and the tips of trees" (indicates it is a reusable R package/library, i.e., a dependency).

"`treedata.table` is designed with the intention of being able to efficiently manipulate trait data and phylogenetic trees to enable comparative analyses." and example running "a Brownian motion analysis" (shows it directly performs domain-specific phylogenetic analyses, i.e., direct research execution).
